Sentencas: In this paper, an intelligent control strategy for a grid connected hybrid energy generation system consisting of Photovoltaic (PV) panels, Fuel Cell (FC) stack and Battery Energy Storage System (BESS) is proposed.
Titulo: Intelligent control strategy for a grid connected PV/SOFC/BESS energy generation system

Sentencas: Firstly, the dynamic modeling of the electrical energy resources is carried out.
Titulo: Intelligent control strategy for a grid connected PV/SOFC/BESS energy generation system

Sentencas: Then, the local controllers of DC-DC power converters are designed to regulate the operating points of the energy generation units.
Titulo: Intelligent control strategy for a grid connected PV/SOFC/BESS energy generation system

Sentencas: An online-trained Elman Neural Network (ENN) based controller is developed to perform the tracking of the optimal operating point of the PV source.
Titulo: Intelligent control strategy for a grid connected PV/SOFC/BESS energy generation system

Sentencas: Moreover, a Takagi-Sugeno-Kang based fuzzy gain tuner is adopted for the adjustment of the PI parameters of the FC and BESS controllers.
Titulo: Intelligent control strategy for a grid connected PV/SOFC/BESS energy generation system

Sentencas: Besides, the Virtual Flux Oriented Control (VFOC) scheme based on neuro-fuzzy gain tuners is adopted to control the power flow between the hybrid system, the local loads and the utility grid.
Titulo: Intelligent control strategy for a grid connected PV/SOFC/BESS energy generation system

Sentencas: Furthermore, a centralized power supervisor is established to determine the levels of the power references for the local controllers according to the supply and demand conditions.
Titulo: Intelligent control strategy for a grid connected PV/SOFC/BESS energy generation system

Sentencas: The simulation results obtained in the Matlab/Simulink environment demonstrate the efficiency of the proposed control scheme.
Titulo: Intelligent control strategy for a grid connected PV/SOFC/BESS energy generation system
